Posts.Content: Had my lumpectomy on 14 June, due to see oncologist on Tuesday. Lumpectomy was no problem discharged next day with drain. Drain removed following morning no pain so far. Dreading Tuesday and the next treatment. Best Wishes to all.
Posts.Title: After Lumpectomy

Posts.Content: Morning all Its been a well since i been on. Second treatment of fec yesterday quite sick but just really wrecked no, waiting on injection feom district nurse. Yesterday i took the bull by the horns and got hair shaved didnt look but relieved its all way no more cleaning up hairs. wig styled and looks really well,great this one stop shop at hospital which provided all this service got  this all done while waiting for chemo. i am praying for all of you in this dark horrrible struggle,nobody understands till you go this yourself,but  i believe you gain a wonderful appreciation of life and the very good kind people there is in the world. love and good health to all.
Posts.Title: TIRED AND SICK WTH FEC
